author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-1271. cpp: missing namespace in generated local reflection

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-1274. compiler: fail compilation if an unexpected token is encountered
This patch makes the lexer throw an exception when an unexpected token is encountered, as opposed to the standard behavior of just printing it out and doing nothing.
